region,target,budget
East,4000,3500
West,3200,2800
North,2200,1800
South,2800,2400

tool_input.commands:
LOAD sales_data.csv
TOSS category equals discontinued
DERIVE margin = revenue - cost
DERIVE margin_pct = margin / revenue
MERGE region_targets.csv on region
DERIVE variance = revenue - target
TALLY region computing total_rev=revenue margin_pct=margin_pct deals=count variance=variance
RANK total_rev desc
TOSS total_variance <= 0
KEEP region total_rev avg_margin_pct deals total_variance
SHOW

error: ERROR at line 1: LOAD: file path must be in double quotes.

TOSS where category is discontinued
DERIVE margin = revenue - cost
DERIVE margin_pct = margin / revenue
MERGE "region_targets.csv" on region
DERIVE variance = revenue - target
TALLY region computing total_rev=revenue margin_pct=margin_pct deals=count variance=variance

tool_input.commands:
LOAD "sales_data.csv"
TOSS category "discontinued"
DERIVE margin = revenue - cost
DERIVE margin_pct = margin / revenue
MERGE "region_targets.csv" on region
DERIVE variance = revenue - target
TALLY region computing total_rev=revenue margin_pct=margin_pct deals=count variance=variance
RANK total_rev desc
TOSS total_variance "0" lte
KEEP region total_rev avg_margin_pct deals total_variance
SHOW

tool_input.commands:
LOAD "sales_data.csv"
KEEP category "active" "premium"
DERIVE margin = revenue - cost
DERIVE margin_pct = margin / revenue
MERGE "region_targets.csv" on region
DERIVE variance = revenue - target
TALLY region computing total_rev=revenue margin_pct=margin_pct deals=count variance=variance
RANK total_rev desc
TOSS total_variance "0" lte
KEEP region total_rev avg_margin_pct deals total_variance
SHOW
